name: The Game of Annie 安妮的游戏
name_original: The Game of Annie 安妮的游戏
description:
Why this game?


It's an indie game, developed by enthusiasts. You are an excellent player in front of the screen and have played many excellent games. However, for this game, as it is the first time for the developer to develop a project, it is inevitable that there are many deficiencies. I hope you can understand. Getting your understanding and support on the screen is the most valuable experience for me. Thank you!

What kind of game is it?


This is a third person action shooter game. Support for custom character size, support for costume change, use guns and bows for long-distance combat, can also use cold weapons for melee combat, with some training elements. Enemies include monsters and humans, as well as AI teammates.

What is the setting of the game?


An unknown virus has infected the world. Most countries in the world have been hit by the virus. Many people have been displaced. After infection, some patients will become manic and aggressive, which makes the transmission speed of the virus faster and faster. Many organizations and institutions have united to concentrate their efforts to fight against the attack of the virus, but due to the rapid spread of the virus, some organizations and organizations have collapsed. The heroine's husband is part of a group working on a cure for the virus, but because the virus is growing so fast, the group must move to a safe area so that work on a cure can continue. Before the vaccine development organization moved the research site, each team member was allowed to bring a family member with them. Because the heroine and her husband had a daughter, so they decided to take her daughter Anne to the organization, so the couple decided to let her husband take her daughter first to the safe place of the organization.

The heroine and her daughter Annie said, "Let's play a game. You and your father first find a safe place to hide from the monster, and then let your mother find you. If your mother finds you and finds you very safe, then you have won the game.
Father and daughter left in a transport plane. The heroine had to walk to the new, uninfected area like the other survivors. But before she reaches her destination, she loses contact with the research organization and her husband and daughter. When she arrived at the institute's new location, she found that the research organization had been overrun by infected patients. After losing contact with her husband and daughter, the heroine is left to survive in this post-apocalyptic environment on her own.

Three years later, the heroine heard the news. Rumor has it that the vaccine research organization has not been completely dismantled, and that they are still working on a cure for the virus. It's just been hidden for a while to be safe. There is also talk of the research group taking survivors in a nearby city, but they will leave after a month for a new safe zone. The heroine believes that if this information is true, then she must get to the location of the research organization and find her family before it leaves. So the heroine begins her journey.

How is the game played?


Step 1 Explore
During the course of the game, there will be day count, and players need to reach the most marginal city within a month after the game starts. Each day will have 12 hours of daylight during which players can choose to explore their current city. The level map read during the exploration is random. The weather is also random. While exploring, you may encounter enemies or monsters, who may be armed thugs or infected monsters. Resources can be collected during combat, which can be used to make items or ammunition.
Step 2 Defend
When the day runs out, the player can no longer explore. You have to go into night mode. In the night mode, different things happen, in the defensive mode, the player has to defend the defensive zone, in the defensive zone you can fight with your teammates, the monster will attack multiple times, first they will destroy the defensive area, enter the defensive zone to attack the player, if the defensive offensive is destroyed, The player can repair during the interval between monster attacks, and continue to hold the area against monster attacks until the end of the night. In Escape mode, you need to escape under cover of night. Get to a safe place in as short a time as possible and build fortifications in the safe place. Join the survivors in holding the fortifications against the enemy until the end of the night.
Step 3 Develop
The experience gained after combat can be used to create new weapons, or to improve skills. Some skill points can increase the player's physical attributes, increase physical stamina, or carry more items and ammo. It can also be used as a skill during combat to increase the player's critical hit rate with different weapons.
Resources acquired after a battle can be used to make item ammo. It can also be stored and used to travel between cities. Resources can also unlock different costumes in the locker room to change the main character's look. You can also unlock new fitness moves in yoga and dance studios.
